tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales(
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
